content.detailedDescription: We were driving home from merrillville on us route 2 when right outside of  valparaiso we saw many bright strange lights in the distance. my son and boyfriend were present at the time. objects looked like they were hovering off in the distance some not moving some seemed to be connected to one another then split off. we watched one moving stopped in midair then did a u turn off sorts! at first we thought it was about 15 planes flying low in a pattern as one got closer it was noticeable that it was no plane! it was huge and made no sound very low and very weird bright lights, flying very slow! as we were driving i rolled my window all the way down and stuck my head and body out the window to watch it fly over the car. the moon was behind it and emitted enough light that i got a very clear picture of it's shape! it was no plane it was triangular and had 3 very bright lights at the points! the weirdest thing was the underneath! many lights then one red light in the middle! my son watched it go over out the back window and he saw this as well. i was scared and i told my boyfriend to rush home to our other children. we were all scared to even turn on the radio! i was worried about what we'd here on the news!! i am not joking! also as it flew off in the distance it kept changing it's light patterns until they looked more like that of a plane? then it disappeared!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: We watched it hover (fly) right over our car very low, no sound strange lights!

content.detailedDescription: I was laying in bed watching tv and i looked out the window and over the river i saw the object
content.summary: Laying in bed saw bright light in distance over maumee river(2 blocks away)

content.detailedDescription:
I got interesting objects to my movie, they moving fast and making strange turns.
all incident takes about 3 minutes. please watch  my clip frame by frame!
content.summary: Dozens unknown objects in the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
I was getting a cup of coffee from my kitchen which looks out over the east of the town. i live on the top floor and have lived here for over 6 years and am well aware of what sorts of things i'm likely to see in the skies over town. there is a local hospital that gets visits from the air ambulance several times a week and also a local police helicopter that is bright red and instantly recognisable. a few miles away there is a training camp which used to be an airfield and rescue helicopters are still based there. i mention these because i am well aware of what a helicopter looks like and have seen aircraft of all types close up and from a distance. my eyesight is also excellent for my age (48).
at 9.30am on the 8th of february 2008 as i stood waiting for the kettle to boil for a cup of coffee, i witnessed a strange object pass over town from the south on a northerly heading. the object appeared to be only a few hundred feet above ground level and was almost at eye-level. it was a clear sunny morning & i was instantly confused by what i was looking at, as it didn't look like a bird or a helicopter or anything instantly recognisable, so i opened the window to listen, but heard nothing but the usual morning traffic in town.
as i watched it seemed to shift its shape almost like a coiled up worm or snake tied in a knot, but it didn't get any bigger or anything. it was dark in colour, almost black/grey and when it moved like that i got the distinct feeling i was looking at a creature not a craft. as it got past town i noticed that there seemed to be something under it and i watched as it went over a hill.
once i couldn't see it anymore i went to the front of the property to see if it was in sight but it had gone. the entire incident had lasted no more than 30 or 40 seconds and i was left very puzzled as to what i'd just seen.
on reflection about half an hour later i saw a helicopter pass at the same angle of view from my kitchen and it struck me that what i had seen earlier was either very big or had been much closer to me than i initially thought. if it had been an aircraft on the same heading, it would have been about 10 times as big as the raf rescue helicopters. if it was closer then it was still bigger than a london bus and yet there was no obvious sound coming from it when i had opened the window. nobody else i know saw it but it was all over very quickly in about 30-40 seconds and if i had been pouring my coffee i would have missed the entire episode.
i could do a sketch if neccessary as i am an artist, but all i would draw would be a dark blob like a dark knot changing shape (like a writhing snake) with an odd hazy area underneath it.
content.summary: Shape shifting low level sighting in barnstaple devon

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside for a smoke and looked to the sky as i alway's do shoreline washington north of seattle.Noticed another star that was more colorful than the rest and leaned up to the house to make sure i was not moving.The object had moved behind a tree so i moved 4 feet to my right and noticed it had moved signifinitly. double checked from where i was standing and confirmed to my self that what ever it was,it was moving. then it started to move left to right as if it was avoiding me or playing hide and seek.After five minutes i got bored and went inside to post my sighting.Double checked at 1:10 am and it was gone.

i have seen ufo's in 3 states and had a experience with other's in lake tahoe.Very close encounter in tacoma 6th ave behind clover leaf on baseball field,hair standing up,very bright.
content.summary: Thought it was a star at first.Noticed it was moving left to right very hi in the sky

content.detailedDescription: who knows. they had every appearance of being stars except flashed purple/red/blue/green and seemed to move around in their area. they didnt look like other stars.
content.summary: Star-like objects making lots of colors in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was visiting gautier, ms for the summer in the late 70's and i remember there was alot of talk in the media about a comet (or possibly meteor) that would be visible early one morning between 2-3am. being a curious person i set my clock to wake up so i could witness this celestial event. i went outside that morning and within a few minutes i did see some heavenly body streak across the sky. just before i was about to go back inside to bed, i saw something else that i've never seen the likes of before or since. in the not too distant night sky i saw a disc shaped object floating slowly towards me. it was very brightly colored (the lights alternated red, blue, green and orange in a circular pattern around the object. i was transfixed by this sight as it inched towards our house. over the next twenty minutes it floated closer and closer to the yard where i was standing. after about ten minutes of observation it was clear to me that this object was approaching and would soon be directly over head. i would estimate the disc at about 500ft in diameter anf flying about 500ft in the air. there were times when it appeared to come to a dead stop and simply hover, then begin floating slowly closer. the flickering alternating colorful lights were the most striking thing about it and i remeber wondering what government technology could produce such an object. at about the 20 minute mark in the sighting, the object was nearly directly over my head and i remember a strong fear coming over me. i was afraid of being spotted by this craft and went back inside the house. from various windows inside i continued to watch the object as it flew over the front of the house and i ended up in my bedroom watching it pass over the back yard. the object never made a sound. there were a bunch of trees behind the house a few hundred yards away; once the object glided over those trees it appeared to descend further. i watched it hover just above those trees for another 10 minutes or so before it ascended and quickly flew out of sight. no airplane, weather balloon, or helicopter that i know of could account for that sighting. i will never forget what i saw that night and i have come to believe that others have  seen the same thing as well.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I witnessed a large circular object approx 500 ft in diameter & approx 500 ft in the air with bright flashing multicolored lights flying slowly and hovering for approx 30 minutes 1 night in ms.

content.detailedDescription: I was standing watch on a freighter approximately 7mi off shore from harrisville, mi.  it was slightly before sundown when i noticed a black object hovering several hundred feet in the air.  it was trianglar in shape with red and white lights at all corners.  it remained stationary for a few minutes.  i viewed it with binoculars.  it was triangular and black.  the texture was looked rough or scored, like it had shapes cut into it.  it also did not appear on radar when i checked.  i called my wheelsman up to the pilothouse to see the object as well.  shortly after he arrived on the bridge the object began moving in our general direction.  it slowly gathered speed and passed our ship astern by a few miles.  the object never made a sound as it went by.  both of us watched as the craft picked up speed and began moving more erratically and unconventionally.  it was changing directions in 90degree turns before it stopped and flew straight up into the air.  it disappeared from site shortly thereafter.  the wheelsman and i just stood there in shock for a few minutes, not really saying a word.  we both eventually got around to talking about it but couldn't quite believe what we saw and even wondered if we had seen anything at all.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangular object approx. 7mi away hovering then making unorthodox movements before disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
Both of these sightings are quite old; i've just recently discovered this way to report it.

the first sighting was in the summer of 2004, the second was the summer of 2007.  (that's about as accurate as i can get, sadly.)  both sightings were in boulder, colorado.  both times it was raining with very low cloud cover, and both times i was on my apartment balcony, facing north (which is more coincidence than anything, no doubt).

during both incidents, i happened to be looking at the cloud formations when i would catch sight of a very small, moving speck of reddish-orange light.  at first i thought it was a small bird, as it looked to be about that size.  but i then noticed that it was moving in a perfectly straight trajectory, and certainly faster than a bird.  i'd be hard-pressed to guess the exact speed, but i'd guess it to be the average speed of a moving car.  this was, however, little more than a point of light from what i could see, and it seemed to be skimming the base of the cloud cover, moving in a perfectly straight line.  i seem to recall that in both instances, the objects were moving northeast.

it wasn't a particularly frightening experience, but it was certainly like nothing i had ever seen or could explain.  i watched the object for quite some time, and both times attempted to call my wife out onto the balcony so she could see it, but by the time she got there it had moved out of sight.

since the last sighting i have looked on line at both commonly-reported ufo sightings as well as weather phenomena that would explain this, and i have not found anything.  i would be very interested in learning if this has been reported by others, and if it has been explained.  thank you.
content.summary: Small, fast-moving speck of light

content.detailedDescription:
It was about one in the morning on a warm summer night. i was sitting on the sand at the beach, about 20 feet from the water. i noticed a light traveling from north to south at about 1000 feet altitude, probably traveling at about 200 mph. this was a solid, white light with no blinking red or green lights like those of a helicopter or an airplane.I was on a west facing beach looking toward catalina island. the name of the beach is sunset beach, in so. california. i watched the light on it's south bound course for about 15 seconds, and then it abruptly assumed a 45 degree angle to the water, and went into the water. it was probably several miles off the coast, so i didn't see or hear any results of the impact, like splashes or noise of the impact. one odd thing about the change of course was that there was no gradual turn into the 45 degree dive, it was very abrupt.

i saw a program on tv about underwater anonalies (usos)and it brought back the memory of this sighting.
content.summary: Object traveling horizontal over ocean,@ 1000 ft., assumes a 45 degree angle, into the ocean.

content.detailedDescription: Well i see this object often from far away from my home.  it looks like a lightbulb, kind of light tan colored.
content.summary: Looks like a small bright light circle

content.detailedDescription:
After a storm and a front moved though there was still some lingering clouds but mostly a clear night sky where i could see the stars.

around 2:45am yesterday night i was on my cell phone with my friend talking to her and sitting on my steps outside my door. in the east i seen what looked like a bright star, at fist i thought it was venus, but it started getting brighter and brighter and it was moving closer, it wasn���t moving very fast probably just a little faster then a normal plane. it wasn't a plane beacuse it was a lot bigger and it didn't make any noise. for a few moments i thought it might have been a meteor rite. it was coming towards me and it looked like it was going to fly over my neighborhood, but  instead it turned upwards and started to rise towards a patch of clouds. there was a break in the clouds and it flew up through them, and then into another higher patch of clouds and disappeared until i couldn���t see it anymore.

a few minutes after that i heard one or two millatary jets fly over out of the opposite direction in the west over my head towards where i seen the light go into clouds. i couldn���t see them though cause there was more clouds that moved in.

i described everything on the phone to my friend as i was seeing it.

i���m not sure what it was���

it could have been.

a falling star that kinda fell/flew but then ascended upward back into the clouds.

a plane with a huge bright light bigger then the plane strapped on the front.

i ruled out it being a satellite or the space station cause it was under the clouds and  sorta low and in mid sky within the earth���s atmosphere.

to me it���s a ufo��� that���s what i got the feeling that it was,
and because it was unidentified, flying, and it was an object.

the best i can describe it is a bright star that looked like venus does on a good night which is what it looked like at first. only it got 50 times bigger as it got closer. i could tell it was bigger then a plane it was glowing like a golden bright white light, oval and round in shape.It didn't make any sound. the maneuvers it made by flying towards me horizontally and then it moved upwards vertically into the clouds have to say that there was something was piloting it. this was defiantly something other then the norm.

i don't have any tapes or pictures.

i'm writing this incace anyone else seen anything or got anything in a photo or on tape the night of febuary the 16th or early in the morning on the 17th 2008 over texas around the time after the cold front moved though. maybe this would give some value to what they seen.
content.summary: A bright light bigger then a plane that looked like a star, but didn't move like one.

content.detailedDescription: Was traveling north on i 75 from cincinnati ohio after dinner. my wife and two friends accompanied me.Fifteen minuetes south of dayton in the franklin ohio area three bright objects appeared in the sky. two of the lights were close together, several yards apart and another about a quarter mile from the other. the light that was hovering by itself would disappear and appear again in several seconds. the lights were clearly not stars or aircraft. i have lived next to wright field and dayton international and i have never seen such objects hover so brightly as these ojects. they appeared for two minuets or slightly more and then disapperared. they did not appear to travel away but were simply not there like a light going off. all that were in the vehicle saw the objects but are in denial and will not discuss the sighting. so, i am telling this because i have the guts to do so. thank you
content.summary: Three star like bodies at approximately 5000 ft high

content.detailedDescription: I'm 42 years old and have a commercial pilot���s license and have been an aircraft mechanic since 1986. i have seen allot of things in the sky but i cannot explain what i saw. i was helping a friend move from his apartment in katy, texas. my wife, my friend, and i were in my friends mini-van on our way to his apartment. being a pilot, i tend to pay attention to things i see in the sky. on this particular day i saw what i thought was a parachute jumper with an inflated canopy at a very high altitude. i was having trouble identifying the exact shape of what i was seeing. as i watched this, i was in a moving vehicle looking up through the windshield. as i watched, i noticed small white balls around the main object in question. i first thought it was parachute jumpers free falling around the parachute that was open but as i watched i noticed that they were not falling down but instead began to move from a stationary position to moving across the sky with some of them moving in different directions. the main object moved toward the northwest with the smaller whitish-silver balls remained relatively close to it, while several of the other white balls moved in different directions and eventually disappeared, but not over the horizon, i mean it disappeared before my eyes in the distance. i continued to watch the main object and the smaller ones as they moved faster. while i was watching my wife asked me what i was staring at and i told her i don't know.  we all got out of the van and observed the objects for 20 minutes or more.  there was no noise.  if you didn't look up and see it you wouldn't even know it was there.  it felt as though we were being watched and observed.  we weren't scared but more curious and frustrated that we couldn't figure out what it was.  after watching it disappears into the sky, not over the horizon, almost like a shooting star but going into outer space vs. falling to the ground.  we kept a vigil over the sky for the next couple of days and started researching it on the internet.  what we found blew us away.  it was exactly what we had seen yet it was seen all over the world.  in spain, mexico, germany, peru and they recently had a sighting over san diego on new year���s day.  if you go to ufo fleet with mother ship that is exactly what we saw.  it was over pecula, mexico in 2006. i can tell you i can't explain it.  it was definitely not balloons, paper lanterns, geese, fireworks, military aircraft, airplanes, hot air balloons, weather balloons or anything that i have ever seen.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw what i thought was a parachute with white dots around it but dots and parachute never came down,

content.detailedDescription:
My sister is the one that saw this.

she said that she was getting out of the car when a very luminous object traveling north was spotted going very slow.  she said it was more luminous than any comet she had ever seen, but explained that the characteristics of it fit that of a usual comet.  the one irregularity in the object was the fact that she said it appeared to be 'sparking' and the fact that it's magnitude was so far above any comet she has ever witnessed.  both her and i have gone to watch comets as well as seen them on random occasions fairly frequently - so she has seen a decent amount.  i'd be interested to see if anyone else locally or elsewhere saw anything similar, perhaps they could offer a more detailed description then she was able to.
content.summary: Some form of meteor?

content.detailedDescription: We were on our balcony at 11:20 pm looking west when i noticed a triangular formation of approximately seven white/amber ovoid lights moving from the southwest to the northwest at about 75 degrees up from the western horizon.  the formation moved slowly, yet made quick rearrangement into a "t" shaped formation, then about ten seconds later changed into a horizontal line...All while continuing to move to the north.  the entire sighting lasted about 45 seconds, which was the time it took to cross the sky.  the objects faded as they continued north.  we heard no sound during or after the sighting, aside from a much closer prop driven airplane.  the objects were noticed because we were looking at the sky and saw movement.  we weren't sure what the object was when we saw it.  we attempted to photograph the objects on a camera phone however the objects were not visible in the picture.
content.summary: Formation of amber colored lights, high and large, but silent

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on hwy 530 west into silvana..Turn left on larson rd. just past the lutheran church we noticed 2 lights above the hill we were driving towards.About 1 mile away.  as we make our way up the first curve, i say to my 15 year old..
"those lights are strange".."yes, i noticed them too, down by the church." she says.  the lights were closer to us..Or we were closer to them. they had not moved. we were thinking it was a plane, or helicopter. i am driving about 2-3 mph. still keeping an eye on the lights/road. they are about 50-100ft above us..We can only see the very bright lights. they have a "cloud-like" or fog likeness around each light.These lights are huge,,guessing no less than 50ft in diameter. my daughter says, "it doesn't have any wings." i say,"yah,,i know". we are now at the top of the hill making a sharp left. it still hovering. moves(glides) a bit then back. we stop in the road to watch it totally. we put down our windows to hear,,thinking we will be able to identify the motor. no noise! total silence! i say to my daughter, it's not making a noise, no engine.We still cannot make out a shape,,,only the oddest, brightest, lights.  we watch as it begins to move off to the sse the two lights become one light in the back...It is going to out of our sight..So we move to a clear space in the road about 50 feet south. it comes into view again,,then as fast as you can process what your are seeing,...It jets sse in a very vertical way. we watch it as it begins to look just like a star in the sky...Before it disapears. it is the way that it left, i turn to my daughter and say, "i think we just saw a ufo" she says, "yah! i know...Cool!"......
content.summary: Bright 50ft diameter lights hovering.Watched it move off into space

content.detailedDescription:
Driving on hwy 530 west into silvana..Turn left on larson rd. just past the lutheran church we noticed 2 lights above the hill we were driving towards.About 1 mile away.  as we make our way up the first curve, i say to my 15 year old..
"those lights are strange".."yes, i noticed them too, down by the church." she says.  the lights were closer to us..Or we were closer to them. they had not moved. we were thinking it was a plane, or helicopter. i am driving about 2-3 mph. still keeping an eye on the lights/road. they are about 50-100ft above us..We can only see the very bright lights. they have a "cloud-like" or fog likeness around each light.These lights are huge,,guessing no less than 50ft in diameter. my daughter says, "it doesn't have any wings." i say,"yah,,i know". we are now at the top of the hill making a sharp left. it still hovering. moves(glides) a bit then back. we stop in the road to watch it totally. we put down our windows to hear,,thinking we will be able to identify the motor. no noise! total silence! i say to my daughter, it's not making a noise, no engine.We still cannot make out a shape,,,only the oddest, brightest, lights.  we watch as it begins to move off to the sse the two lights become one light in the back...It is going to out of our sight..So we move to a clear space in the road about 50 feet south. it comes into view again,,then as fast as you can process what your are seeing,...It jets sse in a very vertical way. we watch it as it begins to look just like a star in the sky...Before it disapears. it is the way that it left, i turn to my daughter and say, "i think we just saw a ufo" she says, "yah! i know...Cool!"......
content.summary: 2 50 ft diameter lights hovering..Watched it leave...

content.detailedDescription:
At approx. 9:15pm my husband arrived home from work and yelled for me to come outside. directly above our home was a huge "ring" around the moon. we could see the moon through it. at first we were very puzzled and decided to walk a bit and watch it. it dawned on us very quickly that, as hard as it is to explain, it was an object...A solid object, i cannot explain how we could see through it. it is difficult to describe this as it's so beyond "normal." it got bigger and appeared to be "lowering." again, we could only see the ring of the outer perimiter of it. we took pictures and the flash of the camera seemed to make it approach faster. we decided quickly to stop that. (pictures show nothing, it was pitch black out.) we went inside to make sure our children were ok as we'd been outside at least 20 minutes. then we came back out, it had moved far "up." it was not nearly as close. there were at least 3 beams of light going across it, this did allow us to notice that it was rotating. i wish i could give more detailed info. but it was so...Hard to discribe. as it was only minutes ago we will be going back out momentarily - i wanted to make a report as it happened. i honestly don't want to see it again. i am blown away that noone else seemed to notice, it was massive. it left in an upward and slightly west direction. when it was gone from sight is was basically still overhead...By that i mean it was moving west, but slightly.

feel free to contact with any questions or if i can answer anything.

i feel very uneasy about this right now.

thanks for reading.
content.summary: Strange very large sphere hovering overhead. moving slowly and beams of light.

content.detailedDescription: Daylight sighting,i was outside feeding my cat when i looked up,because it felt like someone was watching me, disc shape object appeared in sky, no noise and bronze in color moved slowy across the sky, and then went straight up and out of sight.I didn't know what to think of it,so i asked my neighbor. she told me to report the sighting to the mufon.I still can't believe that i saw it.
content.summary: Appeared in sky ,moved across slowly,then went  straight up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I know i waited too long to report this weird event and i'm not even sure of the exact date, so i'm just approximating it.  i am a retired u.S. marine, and have worked on aircraft since i was 18.  
i was on my way to work one morning, i usually left at around 4:15 a.M. for my 1 hour drive to work at one of the aircraft manufacturing companies, in wichita.  i was approximately 1 mile south of marion, when i saw four white flashing lights, like the ones you would see on two radio towers that were side-by-side, off to the east maybe a quarter to half a mile away from me.  the lights were not really bright, but they were flashing.  i would guess that they were about 60 to 75 feet apart in a square shape.  i know where the radio towers around marion are located, and there are none where i saw these lights. the radio towers are pretty much to the west of town and to the north of where i was, near the county airport.  anyway, i continue driving south on this road, and i kept looking to the east and those lights are still there, like they are pacing me off to the side. i then get to the end of the road which ends at highway 50, and turn right heading west.  i just shook it off as strange and continued driving to work.  25 miles later, i merged onto interstate 135 south in newton, i looked over to the west, and there they are again, still pacing me.  after i was about 8 miles south of newton, i didn't bother to look anymore.  needless to say, i got to work on time, so i didn't have any missing time, which was okay with me.
content.summary: Paced for approx 40 miles on way to work.

content.detailedDescription:
i am reporting this for jane yeager who has no personal e-mail access at home. she is a bank manager and her computer would be monitored at work. she sent me a written description of the events, as well as talked to me about them in depth. i am reporting what she gave me here. 

i lived in the same developmentlater on after more homes were built and the sightings stopped. strangely, jane reported that the ufos seemed to be doing something in the area where our home was later built. there was a beautiful, positive energy on the land where we lived and many people experienced and commented on it. one person said it felt like the first rung on the ladder to heaven!! silverware stored in a hutch in the dining room did not tarnish during the 10 years that we lived there! (it does tarnish now!!) there was a guest bedroom over the dining room that we called the healing room, because of the way it felt. numerous guests who slept in that room reported sleeping like they had never slept before. one guest reported watching a civil war phantom cross through the room and out through the wall. he didn't know that there was a creek across the road called soldiers' branch - - named after a civil war sqirmish that happened there!! whether the energy on the land had anything to do with the numerous sightings my friend saw in that area before the house was built, i don't know, but thought i would mention it:

ellen ferguson
919-477-4040

jane's story: 1989 - 1992 angier, nc
we lived in a rural development known as neills creek farms, in a small rural community. our home was the third home built there in the first phase of the development. the second phase was totally undeveloped at the time of the sightings, and was where we saw most of the craft. 

we thought at the time that what we were seeing was experimental aircraft from fort bragg & pope air force base which wasn't too far away. 

on many occasions we watched boomerang shaped craft come and move around the area. they would hover and stand perfectly still just above the tree tops at times.  there was absolutely never any sound associated with the craft. they were able to raise, lower, speed back and forth effortlessly.

there was pasture land in front of us that was slightly hidden by trees. in oher words, you could clearly see into the pasture. some of the trees had already been cleared in anticipation of future home construction. there were cattle in the pasture most of the time.

the craft usually appeared just before dusk. we turned off our lights and watched them from our front porch for what seemed like 10-15 minutes,only to discover that 2-3 hours had passed. we would hurry back into the house to get ready for the next day. we always thought they must be working or experimenting with the craft before heading back towards the base. they appeared to be doing something with the cattle as they shot the light down on them. the bright light came from the middle of the craft as it shot down toward the ground. there were crystal aqua colored lights around the bottom of the craft. the cattle seemed unfazed by their presence. 

we had company on one occasion and the craft appeared while they were visiting us. the couple refused to visit after that because they thought something was strange about it, first of all, seeing the craft and losing time.  they were spooked and refused to talk about it again. so we didn't. 

we once saw a craft that looked like a tank but most of the craft were boomerang shaped with a heavy middle. the boomerang craft were the size of a football field. my ex-husband said they looked similar to an awac (?) we thought it strange that on one occasion helicopters appeared and seemed to be chasing the craft; the craft were gone in an instant,making not one sound in the process. 

my daughter and i each found a scooped out place on the back of our leg that we didn't connect with the craft, since at that time we thought they had to be terrestrial. on another occasion, someone pointed out a group of dead animals in the woods. i remember 2 cows, several deer, foxes and numerous dead birds on the ground. again, at the time we didn't put it together with the ufos. there was no sign of injury on the animals.

a friend overheard a man in the grocery store telling someone about seeing a ufo take up a cow!! i don't know if this was related. we never saw them actually take a cow.

i hope this is helpful. i feel it is a major sighting although i had absolutely no idea at the time what they might be.

feel free to contact me for further details.

jane yeager
content.summary: Multiple sightings of craft that hovered and shot down light on cows. had missing time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving town and headed north on a local road . a few miles out of town the road goes into a canyon and there are power-lines that cross over and above the road. as i was approx. a half a mile from the power lines i saw what looked like a large hook come out from the bottom of a cloud and travel just above the power lines, in the same direction, untill they went over the top of the mountain and out of my sight.. the whole thing lasted only 5-10 seconds.
               i called the local power co.When i got back home and asked if there was any unusual activity around the time that i saw this object and they said no.. i travel this road almost on a daily basis and have never seen it again , nor had i seen it before that time. i do look now each and every time i travel the road wheather it is day or night at those power lines. i'll never forget what i saw there and it will continue to mystify me forever.
content.summary: Saw an object come out of a cloud.Fish-hook like in appearence

content.detailedDescription:
We witnessed two ufo fly-overs the evening of 2/14.  one at 8:30pm and another at 9:09pm.  i recorded almost 5 minutes of digital video and the results are spectacular to say the least.  it's easy to mistake these ufos for conventional aircraft because they can, and do, mimic not only the appearance, but also the sounds of conventional aircraft.  i've attached a picture captured from video of a ufo that could easily be mistaken for a helicopter but in reality is a triangle-shaped craft seen almost side-on. these ships are made up of seven or more "orbs" of coherent, laser-like light which allows them to appear solid yet shape-shift instantaneously.  they can even disguise themselves as a jet or some other craft and the only way you'd know is if you took a picture.  the "jet" or whatever, won't show up in the photo -- only an orb of light.  truly amazing.

these ships have been patrolling the austin skys for almost two weeks and   if i hadn't seen them with my own eyes i wouldn't believe it was possible.  but now i have detailed video and it is a proven fact that these objects exist.  i've worked many hours to assemble a video and i'd like to sell it to one of the news organizations.  seeing is believing.

p.S.  these things are not "silent".  if you hear a loud aircraft where you wouldn't expect to hear one then take notice -- and if you see what you think is a conventioanl aircraft take a good look at its lights.  the ufo lights are far more saturated and brilliant than ours.
content.summary: Fantastic fly-over!

content.detailedDescription: I was working exited the rear of the building lit my ciggerette when i noticed a plane flying over head then remarked to myself how clear a night it was yet lacking in stars due to the brightness of the moon so i looke over at the moon and i a verry large triangle shape 4-5 times larger than the moon where 3 motion less blue circles as i looked at them the faded from blue to red then i came back in to report it to a co worker who is a ufo buff and he sudjested i report it on this sight
content.summary: 3 collered lights to the left of the moon in a verry large triangle

content.detailedDescription:
I was in crystal city, tx the night of 2/8/08.  i was at a friend's house when suddenly my other friend points to the sky and shouts 'hey guys check this out!!!'  we look to the southern sky and there was an orange 'orb' that was vanishing, then reappearing in a different position in the sky.  then multiples would appear.  4 of them appeared and would position themselves in a triangular formation then shift to a linear formation, then vanish.  the same pattern kept up for about an hour. 

at first i thought they could've been flares of some sort from say a fighter jet.  we were trying to listen for the sound of a jet engine, to no avail.  the objects were silent and were maneuvering through the air in the way a flare absolutely could not!
content.summary: Objects in the night sky resembled orange fireballs, would swiftly shift formation, vanish then reappear.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello mufon,

on friday, february 15, 2008, at three o���clock in the afternoon, i saw an object in the sky over eugene, oregon.  i was sitting on a patio at the time, in the downtown area of the city, having a late lunch.

the day was slightly overcast, with only a thin layer of high altitude cirrus clouds, and it was very warm for february, about 55 degrees.  i was thinking about how nice it was, and i happened to glance up to see if any rain clouds had formed.

high overhead, and slightly to the east of me, i saw a small object that appeared to be at least a thousand feet above the ground.  i���m judging it���s altitude mostly by the cloud cover.  i know this particular type of cloud is always at least a thousand feet high, and the object was moving in and out of the scattered cloud cover, although it was never completely hidden by the clouds.

the object was not large; it would have been covered by a golf ball held at arm���s length.  but the detail was very clear.  the object was brilliant white, and it appeared to shine with it���s own light source.  it was round on top, and there was a flat area on the bottom.  the flat area was slightly concave, like a crescent moon, waning past the half phase.  below that, there was a thin, bright filament of bright light.  it looked like a string of pure light.  at the end of this filament, there was a round light, switching in color from orange to green to bright white.  this lower light would also disappear, as part of the cycle of color change.

the lower light  was moving in a circular pattern below the larger body, as if the filament of light were a string, and the lower light was being swung on it, in a slow circle.

i have some training in astronomy, and i know that some satellites can be observed in daylight.  i���m also familiar with how things look when they are in low earth orbit.  this object was not in orbit.  it���s path across the sky was too slow.  it appeared to hover, and it also moved very slowly from north east to south west.  the winds aloft, judging by movement of the cloud cover, were easterly, and slow, maybe ten miles an hour, so the object was moving at almost ninety degrees to the direction of the wind.

after about five minutes of observation, the object changed course.  it did not speed up, but it began to move due east, in the same direction as the wind.  it appeared to move more slowly than the wind, however; the clouds were passing it by.  the object eventually just got too far away for me to see.

the object was small, but it was not far away, being almost directly overhead when i sighted it.  it was close enough that i could see small details.  the upper portion was smooth and round.  there were no ���flight surfaces��� anywhere on it.

i have no idea what this could have been.  i know that when i saw it, i was having a very pleasant moment.  it had been a relaxing day.  i���ve just moved eugene, and i was thinking what a nice place it was, and i was having one of those rare moments when there are no worries and no stress.  my mind was open and at ease.  i thought about running inside to ask someone to look at the object with me, but they are all strangers to me, and i have to admit i was embarrassed to ask a roomful of strangers to ���come look at the ufo out here.���

later in the day, i called a friend, and told her all about it.  she���s interested in ufo���s and has had a close encounter.  then my sister called.  during our conversation, i said, ���hey, i saw������ and the phone went dead at that instant.  she called back, and i did not mention the ufo further.  the phone connection was perfect for the rest of our thirty minute conversation.  this object had the ���strangeness��� that so many  people talk about when they have a sighting.  it was entirely real, and yet it also seemed to be ���not completely here��� in some way.

thanks for listening.  you may contact me with questions if you like.
content.summary: Saw very strange object over dowtown.  crescent, light filament attached, swinging light below, circling, attached to filament

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were sitting outside and lloked up at the sky and saw a line of lights that were extremely far away.  in an instant they changed formation into a square. i ran inside to get my camera and came out and the memory was full.  i deleted some photos and looked up and they dissapeared after i looked up.  they dissappeared in to the clear night sky.  this all happened in about 1 minute because they were extremely fast and they were very far away.
content.summary: Sat outside and saw them, looked up for a little bit and they were gone

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting i our hot tub last night around 7pm for the sole purpose of relaxing and looking at the stars. it was a crystal clear night with quite a bit of light from the moon, so i purposely did not turn any lights on in the hot tub or in the immidiate area.
we are in what is known as the pine belt area of the sierras we are not quite foothills but not fully in the mountains, but we are rather remote and there is very little city light to obstruct out view of the night sky.
i was just enjoying looking at the stars, and noticed yet another plane coming from the general area of the sacramento airport, which is quite a distance from us. (about 50 miles as the crow flies). i was watching the plane which was to far west of me and something to my east caught my eye. i gave my fuull attamnetionto the area where the movement was and saw a very weird thing happen. it appeared that an oval "chunk" of the sky was moving. the only way i can think to describe it was as if something were flying over head with a "cloaking" device for lack of a better descriptor.
it was like whateverit was was projecting an image of the nightsky on its underside to cover tiself, but since it was moving the edges of the stars were distorting. it looked like it was not that far over head, it was oval shaped and took about 5 seconds to cross over head from west to east. i have a fairly large view of the night sky where i live and was able to watch it for a long stretch but then it just blended in as it got further out of my range. my reaction was very strange as well. i found myself laughing and said out loud to no one, "so that's how they do it.".
content.summary: An opaque oval object travelled across the sky from west to east.
